Name: Rewrite - DYH
About the game: Welcome to Rewrite - DYH A game that changes every time you play! Dialog options will change randomly as every option may lead you to a different ending In this unusual Visual Novel you get to control the mysterious Andrian who has the power to grant 3 Wishes. Your mission is to achieve happiness for Jeff - a person that lost it all. Revealing different wishes and unlocking different clues will add you more options for more endings. Will you be able to get a perfect ending? Or will you rather listen to...Never mind. See you in our game! Isabelle Full Version: Includes: Many more game endings, The ability to grant wishes, A hidden path. Demo - No Wishes Version : Doesn't have the option to grant wishes, no special features and a certain someone will not approach you...
